channel.title: Kill monster method!
channel.description:
Ok i saw this on uber server and i tryd allot but really allot i was even hoppeles enofto try implement a part of npchandler to clint.java (sorry i got despreate) but anyway...how can i make a global message apaer when i kill a monster like for example a KBD (50) it doesnt got aything to do whit the message but if i know how to do it whit a message i know ho to make ...(secret sorry)
else if you know how to make a npchandler public int read in client.jva share! ,if you help me i'l give you 5 reply++ and 200k rs cash !!
